BodyName: Subcommittee on Planning, Dispositions and Concessions

Items.Title: Application no. 20115418 HAM, approval of a modification to a plan and project located at Block 1736/Lot 1, Council District no. 9, Borough of Manhattan.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant to Article V of the New York Private Housing Finance Law, at the request of the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application no. 20115746 HAK, an Urban Development Action Area Project located at 1413 Pitkin Avenue, Council District no. 41, Borough of Brooklyn.
